effective_at.description: The `Date-Time` as of which this account is effective on the server.

product_id.description: A unique product ID generated by Canopy.

external_product_id.description: Note: The value passed here *must* be unique. A unique external ID that may be used interchangeably with the Canopy-generated product ID. Either external ID or Canopy product ID must be passed at the time of account creation.

external_account_id.description: Note: The value passed here *must* be unique. This ties to a reference of your account in an external system. For example, you may have a ten digit loan number you use to reference the account.

external_fields.description: External fields can be used to relate accounts created in Canopy to entities in your or any external system.

key.description: key: i.e. Name of the External Party

payment_processor_name.description: Indicates the active payment processor used for payments made by the account. If `NONE`, Canopy will not trigger payments to any payment processor when they occur.

autopay_enabled.description: Indicates whether autopay is enabled for this account. Autopay is triggered one day prior to due date. If `payment_processor_name` is `NONE`, autopay will not be triggered for the account regardless of this field.

repay_config.description: All sensitive bank information will be replaced with a secure token when performing transactions.

repay_payment_method.description: The payment method used by the account

repay_check_type.description: Type of checking account: Personal or Business.

repay_account_type.description: Type of account: Savings or Checking.

repay_transit_number.description: Transit number is a nine-digit code based on the U.S. Bank location where your account was opened.

repay_account_number.description: Account number is an eight to ten digit number that identifies a specific account.

repay_name_on_check.description: Account holder's name as it appears on the account.

first_cycle_interval.description: Interval for a first cycle for this account.

credit_limit_cents.description: Total amount (in cents) that this account can borrow.

max_approved_credit_limit_cents.description: Total amount (in cents) that this account can borrow.

late_fee_cents.description: The fee charged for late payments on the account.

payment_reversal_fee_cents.description: The fee charged for payment reversals on the account.

origination_fee_cents.description: The fee charged at the time of account origination

annual_fee_cents.description: An annual fee to be charged yearly from the date of account creation. It will reflect on the subsequent statement once incurred.

monthly_fee_cents.description: A monthly fee to be charged monthly from the date of account creation. It will reflect on the subsequent statement once incurred.

initial_principal_cents.description: The initial principal balance (in cents) for the account.

promo_impl_interest_rate_percent.description: The percentage interest applied to the account during the promotional period (e.g. 6.2)

post_promo_impl_interest_rate_percent.description: The percentage interest applied to the account during the post-promotional period (e.g. 6.2)

post_promo_len.description: If applicable, post-promotional amortization length in cycles.

merchant_name.description: A merchant name associated with the account

lender_name.description: A lender name associated with the account

assign_customers.description: Array of existing customer IDs to be added to the account. At least one existing *OR* one new customer must be included in account creation.

customer_id.description: A unique account ID generated by Canopy.

customer_account_role.description: The role of the customer for the account.

customer_account_external_id.description: A unique number for the customer on the account. For instance, a credit card number. If none is provided, a Canopy-generated ID can be used.

memo.description: Friendly name to identify the card

type.description: The type of card created by Lithic

state.description: The state of the new card

card_program_token.description: Token belonging to the card program under which to create the card.
